FAQ.Question: Is this only for beginners?
FAQ.Answer: No. It suits beginners and adults who already read but need correction.

FAQ.Question: Can I start with zero Arabic?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. The course is designed for non-Arab & English-speaking adults.

FAQ.Question: Do I need to memorize Tajwīd rules?
FAQ.Answer: No. Tajwīd is learned through practice, not theory.

FAQ.Question: Will I be able to read confidently on my own?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. Fluency training prepares you for independent recitation.

FAQ.Question: How are mistakes corrected?
FAQ.Answer: With calm guidance and clear correction — without pressure.
